svcproc.title: Adjust Brakes

warning.para: You must manually adjust the brake after you perform maintenance or service. Do not depend on the automatic adjusters to remove the excessive clearance created when you back-off the brake during service. The automatic adjusters are designed to compensate for normal lining wear. Damage to components and serious personal injury can occur.

svcproc.para: Refer to Meritor Maintenance Manual 4, Cam-Master® Cam Brakes, for complete brake adjustment procedures.
